name: Tapu Fini
description: The Land Spirit Pokémon. This guardian deity of Poni Island manipulates water. Because it lives deep within a thick fog, it came to be both feared and revered.

abilities.name: Misty Surge
abilities.description: If the move is known, this Pokémon may use the Misty Terrain move as a bonus action.

abilities.name: Telepathy
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot be damaged by its allies' attacks.
